attributes.action: United Kingdom is the second country of the world with high total crimes. Lets give our police more power to act on crimes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Can we the people change our country United Kingdom to better safer country by creating new laws, to give the police more power to stop crimes. We dont want soft laws to allow crimes such anti social behaviour without any prosecution. Please lets change our country to safer country lets allow our poilce to have more power.

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
